I can render complex 4K projects in half the time it took on my previous Intel Mac. The Space Black finish is sleek and surprisingly resistant to fingerprints.', 'Best laptop screen I have ever seen. The speakers are also surprisingly deep and clear for a laptop.']}, 'ASUS ROG Zephyrus G16 (2025) GA605': {'price': 2545.0, 'brand': 'ASUS', 'category': 'Electronics', 'product_id': 'P035', 'rating': 4.4, 'reviews': ["If you're looking for a 'MacBook for gamers,' this is the perfect choice. It handles heavy creative software easily, though the fans can get a bit loud when you're pushing the RTX 5070 to its limit.", 'Nicer than I expected for a gaming rig. The Ceraluminum finish is smooth and premium. the bass could be punchier.']}, 'GlowGear Wired Strike': {'price': 55.0, 'brand': 'GlowGear', 'category': 'Electronics', 'product_id': 'P042', 'rating': 4.5, 'reviews': ["No lag issues since it's
